
## Row

### Chart A

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()
```

### Chart B

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = color, y = price)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

## Row {.tabset .tabset-fade}

### Chart C

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = price)) + 
  geom_freqpoly(aes(color = cut), binwidth = 500, linewidth = 0.75)
```
